postText:
Hi everyone,

I'm super excited to anounce that I will be making a big step in my life today, not only will I join Hike One to continue my interaction design journey in order to continue to reach new UX milestones, but I will also switch countries, trading the life of Brussels for a new life in Rotterdam, NL.

It wasn't an easy decision, however, as I had to leave my awesome colleagues at Proximus (made possible thanks to my consultancy agency Movify), from whom I learned so much, and really got to enjoy their company a lot. I really want to thank you all for the great times together.

Starting today, I'm really excited to explore what UX challenges the Netherlands has in store, and I know that my new agency is the place to discover that. Happy to be on board!

postText:
Orange Belgium (ex-Mobistar) est l‚Äôun des principaux op√©rateurs t√©l√©com du pays. Pr√©sent en Flandre, Wallonie et √† Bruxelles, il sait s'adapter aux gr√©s des envies avec des formules incluant t√©l√©phonie mobile, internet, t√©l√©vision et t√©l√©phonie fixe.

√Ä propos

Populaire aupr√®s des consommateurs belges depuis sa cr√©ation en 1996, Orange Belgium est l‚Äôun des principaux concurrents du g√©ant¬†Proximus. Pendant longtemps, l‚Äôop√©rateur a commercialis√© ses services sous le nom de Mobistar. Ce n‚Äôest qu‚Äôen¬†2016¬†qu‚Äôil en change pour, enfin, devenir Orange Belgium.

Le saviez-vous ?¬†En 1999, trois op√©rateurs se partageaient le march√© belge : Belgacom (devenu Proximus), Mobistar (devenu Orange Belgium) et Orange (devenu BASE). Et oui,¬†Mobistar et¬†BASE¬†n‚Äôont en fait jamais √©t√© li√©s. D‚Äôailleurs, ils ne le sont toujours pas. Le nom commercial a simplement √©t√© identique √† un moment donn√© de l‚Äôhistoire belge des t√©l√©coms.

L‚Äôhistoire de Mobistar, devenu Orange Belgium

1995 :¬†fin du monopole de Belgacom
1996 :¬†d√©ploiement du r√©seau de t√©l√©phonie mobile en 6 mois
2000 :¬†d√©j√† 1 million de clients !
2001 :¬†2 millions de clients. Mobistar int√®gre le groupe Orange (actionnaire majoritaire)
2002-2005 :¬†lancement de l‚Äôinternet mobile (GPRS), du service MMS, du syst√®me de paiement M-BANXAFE et du portail (Orange World)
2006 :¬†3 millions de clients et d√©ploiement d‚Äôun r√©seau hotspots WIFI.
2007 :¬†rachat de VOXmobile et lancement du service ‚ÄúInternet Everywhere‚Äù
2010 :¬†4 millions de clients !
2014 :¬†Mobistar propose internet haut d√©bit et t√©l√©vision num√©rique.
2016 :¬†Mobistar devient Orange Belgium, pour une plus grande homog√©n√©it√© des enseignes que le groupe Orange poss√®de.

Ce que les clients aiment chez Orange Belgium
Les¬†efforts de l‚Äôex-Mobistar pour fournir un service client√®le de qualit√©¬†portent leurs fruits. En effet, dans l‚Äôensemble, les clients semblent assez satisfaits par l‚Äôop√©rateur. Apr√®s tout, ses investissements visant √† am√©liorer leur exp√©rience sont consid√©rables. Pour cela, la qualit√© de son r√©seau, des services et des produits qu‚Äôil propose est essentielle.

Souvent consid√©r√©e comme¬†excellente, la couverture du r√©seau¬†(notamment pour la 4G), est un argument qui met tout le monde d‚Äôaccord. En plus d‚Äôun large choix de formules, Orange Belgium s√©duit avec sa¬†vaste gamme de smartphones offertes¬†parmi ses ventes coupl√©es. author: Stef Nimmegeers
designation: Co-Founder at Bothrs & Healthblocks, Product Strategist, Podcast Host
postText:
One of the biggest challenges in digital health is achieving full #interoperability. But what does that mean, and why does it matter?

In the analog world, almost everyone can read words printed on paper. But in the digital realm however, data can't be universally interpreted or shared, and especially data-hoarding companies are reluctant to even support this idea.

But we have to make a conscious effort to make data flow freely, enabling healthcare providers and various records systems to electronically share patient information without fail.

This is what interoperability means in healthcare.

It's making sure that patient data is always available to stakeholders. I believe it's the only way to truly enable virtual care in creating better outcomes for patients. And boy, are there a ton of stakeholders involved.

Think patients, practitioners, care teams, healthcare service providers, diagnosticians, specialists, health insurers...

It's a massive challenge, one that makes adoption of digital health solutions at scale, much more difficult.

Here are some additional challenges within interoperability:

üëâ Overcoming organizational resistance to sharing data
üëâ Managing inconsistent information across multiple sources
üëâ Validating electronic requests for patient information
üëâ Costs of hiring specialists to manage interoperability

Legislation can make a huge difference here. Even in the U.S., one of the few remaining first-world countries without universal healthcare, the Cures Act basically forces practices to mobilize their data.

I wish we could say the same for the EU üòÖ

Luckily, organizations are taking it upon themselves to level up interoperability by creating powerful partnerships.

Even just now, I learned that the teleconsultation app, Doktr by Proximus, has partnered with CM - Christelijke Mutualiteit and Domus Medica vzw to strengthen their local ecosystem. Huge!

The intent is ensuring that video consultations become fully complementary to physical consultations, and serving patients and doctors in a hybrid care model. And that means getting all stakeholders involved.

What do you think? What else can we do to improve interoperability in healthcare? Let me know!

(PS: To give you an idea of the complexity, here's the basic data model created by HL7/FHIR that defines the different resource types that encompass all aspects of healthcare)

#digitalhealth #healthcare #digitaltransformation #datascience #virtualcare #challenges

In our Network Department we are looking for a RAN Technology Expert¬†¬†for Innovative Mobile Network Solutions.

Mission : Delivers an innovative product catalogue of (5G) indoor solutions with the objective to attract new B2B customers or grow the existing business with B2B customers. Builds the appropriate indoor solutions for our B2B customers taking into account their needs, thereby collaborating closely with the relevant B2B teams as well as with the technical teams of Orange Belgium and Mwingz*.
¬†
¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Closely follows-up the market with regards to special coverage solutions, with a particular focus on 5G in close cooperation with Orange Group Centre of Expertise.

¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Ensures the delivery of the technical answers to the RFPs by ensuring cooperation with B2B, geomarketing and MWingz* (including coverage figures, technical capabilities of the mobile network, specific indoor coverage solutions)
¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Ensures proper hand over of B2B customer indoor solutions to Mwingz to ensure a successful implementation and proactively follows-up impact on coverage of ongoing moves as well as on main coverage KPIs both for legacy and 5G/IOT technologies (coverage maps, coverage population,etc)

Il 16 di Marzo 2022 , Proximus, Telco Belga, ha affermato che i dati di 15.000 persone e aziende potrebbero essere stati resi pubblici attraverso un hack digitale nei suoi sistemi API, ha detto la societ√† a Datanews.

Non sono state prese password o informazioni finanziarie, ha osservato la societ√†.

Quindi, per quelle aziende che sono convinte di avere tutto ci√≤ di cui hanno bisogno nei tuoi WAF e in altre soluzioni edge, sto lanciando una sfida .

author: Eric Luteijn
designation: B2B tech influencer - MD & Publisher LuteijnMedia BV
postText:
Interview: Martijn van Engelen, CEO van #SNEW: ‚ÄòCirculair is geen jeukwoord‚Äô ‚îÇ ITchannelPRO

Termen als #duurzaamheid en #circulariteit hebben de neiging in het zweverige te blijven hangen. Echte stappen maken met circulair, vereist een business case, vindt oprichter en CEO Martijn van Engelen van SNEW | Circular Telecom & IT . Mede door de eigen harde business case mag het bedrijf vanaf maart het #ECG_certificaat voeren.

Martijn heeft een lange loopbaan in de ICT en gebruikte die ervaring bij de oprichting van SNEW (spreek uit: as new) in 2013. Maar er lag een diepere basis aan ten grondslag.

‚ÄúAls 18-jarige zag ik in de autosloperijbranche hoe waardevol gebruikte onderdelen zijn‚Äù, vertelt hij. ‚ÄúHoe fabrikanten de levensduur van hun onderdelen verkorten. Zo ben ik in de wereld van de service-onderdelen terechtgekomen.‚Äù

Van #VERbruik naar #GEbruik
Het concept van SNEW is een verlengde daarvan: het¬†VERbruikersproces omzetten in een¬†GEbruikersproces, waarbij de lifecycle van onderdelen op de eerste plaats staat. ‚ÄúIn de elektronicabranche verdampt 70 procent van de grondstoffen en wordt 30 procent hergebruikt‚Äù, zegt Martijn.

‚ÄúAls we dat niet goed oplossen, kunnen op een gegeven moment geen nieuwe smartphones meer gemaakt. Grondstoffen zijn eindig, dus daar moeten we over nadenken. Juist door de keten goed te sluiten en de levenscyclus te verlengen, kun je vervangingsinvesteringen uitstellen.

Op een gegeven moment heb je geen nieuwe grondstoffen meer nodig. Mensen willen geen producten kopen, ze willen comfort.‚Äù

Het hoeft volgens Martijn niet zo te zijn dat een grondstof na¬†gebruikt¬†te zijn ook per se is¬†verbruikt. ‚ÄúWe zijn experts in #product_lifecycle_management in de breedste zin van het woord‚Äù, vat Martijn samen.

‚ÄúWe sluiten naadloos aan op de processen bij klanten of partners. Zo hebben we een serviceprobleem opgelost voor Proximus. Het is een kwestie van verlengen naar vervangen, en van vervangen naar verlengen.

Hergebruik eerst, recycle later. We streven naar het omvormen van producten naar diensten. Neem printers. De apparaten zelf zijn weinig waard, de cartridges zijn het verdienmodel.

Na 3 tot 5 jaar is een computer afgeschreven, maar hij is nog gewoon goed. Iets is echter pas echt goed ondersteund als ook de lifecycle daarin wordt meegenomen. We zijn koploper in het behoud van functionaliteit en daarmee de duurzaamheid van apparatuur.‚Äù

Preventief onderhoud
SNEW gebruikt het percentage hergebruik en recycling van alle binnengekomen goederen, gemiddelde levensduur van producten, gebruiksduur van de eerste cyclus en tweede (hergebruik)cyclus, CO2-besparing (hergebruik versus nieuw) en bespaarde grondstoffen door hergebruik respectievelijk recycling als belangrijkste kerncijfers.

Dat gaat verder dan het puur doorverkopen of leasen van systemen. Martijn noemt het ‚Äòcruciaal‚Äô om naar de bestemming van een product te kijken. ‚ÄúNa het preventief onderhoud, wat zeer ..

.. lees het hele interview https://bit.ly/3wKBQR1 op ITchannelPRO

Do you know how was contributing to the solution of a global waste problem?

Hack the Waste allowed us to contribute new perspectives with international students from Belgium, the Netherlands, Slovenia, Croatia, Serbia, and South Africa. The idea was to create interdisciplinary teams on Concepting, Design, Marketing, and Business Strategies. In a span of just 24 hours, we were tasked to create within an "interdisciplinary" team¬†a new approach to waste management.

If we analyze which values ‚Äã‚Äãthis methodology reinforces, we could see that nowadays most of them are quite demanded. For example entrepreneurship, involvement, personal and group initiative, effort, innovation, teamwork, communication, management of new technologies, use of a foreign language...In addition to the transversal objectives that can be achieved in this case, we find active new recycling, knowledge of new technologies, and new manufacturing processes among others.

It was an enriching experience. We collaborate with new people, which led us to learn how people from other cultures and disciplines work.

Llevo un tiempo hablando de un posible problema de seguridad relacionado con las API. Gartner lo reconoci√≥ a finales del a√±o pasado y agreg√≥ un nuevo componente a su modelo de arquitectura de seguridad que destaca la brecha existente en los WAF y las pasarelas API.

Hoy vemos que los ataques est√°n llegando como lo predijo Gartner a trav√©s de la API como su vector de ataque favorito.

El 16 de marzo de 2022, Proximus, Telco Belga, dijo que los datos de 15,000 personas y empresas podr√≠an haberse hecho p√∫blicos a trav√©s de un hack digital en sus sistemas de API, dijo la compa√±√≠a a Datanews.

La irrupci√≥n surgi√≥ despu√©s de que los clientes comenzaron a recibir correos electr√≥nicos de phishing. A trav√©s de la filtraci√≥n de noticias, es posible que se hayan sustra√≠do datos como el nombre de la empresa, el nombre y los apellidos de los usuarios, la direcci√≥n de correo electr√≥nico, el n√∫mero de tel√©fono, el n√∫mero de IVA, el sexo y la direcci√≥n de la empresa. No se tomaron contrase√±as ni informaci√≥n financiera, observ√≥ la compa√±√≠a.

As√≠ que para aquellas empresas que est√°n convencidas de que tienen todo lo que necesitan en sus WAF y otras soluciones Edge, estoy lanzando un desaf√≠o.

Deje que Appythings & SALT Security realice una auditor√≠a de seguridad de la API para probar sus API. Si no encontramos ning√∫n hueco o problema, la auditor√≠a ser√° gratuita. Yes, it's free! No es invasivo para su sistema y solo toma unos minutos de su tiempo para iniciar la auditor√≠a.

A little background in case you missed our previous post: On the 30th of March, the European Commission will present a legislative proposal including rules on labelling the environmental impact of a product. The Commission is looking into using the Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) method, specifically the Product Environmental Footprint (PEF). The big question for this legislative proposal is whether the European Commission will make the assessment and labelling of the environmental impact of products (with LCA's) mandatory or voluntary. The coalition is asking for it to be mandatory.

author: CEP News
postText:
Seven large companies joined forces in Belgium mid last year to form the delivery collective¬†CULT¬†(Collaborative Urban Logistics & Transport).¬†Now, the companies have launched the first bundled deliveries in Antwerp.¬†bpost¬†has been selected for the deliveries in the trial region and will not only be delivering parcels but also pallets to retail stores.
Deliveries will be made emission-free and at fixed times using cargo bikes and electric delivery vans. The companies involved include¬†Danone, supermarket chain¬†Delhaize Belgium, beverage producer¬†Jacobs Douwe Egberts Professional Belgium, hair and cosmetics wholesaler¬†Pro-Duo, mobile phone operator¬†Proximus, telephone service provider¬†Telenet¬†and shoe shop¬†Schoenen Torfs.
Based on initial test deliveries and the results of analyses, the companies expect to save more than a quarter of the kilometres driven and reduce emissions almost tenfold. The initiative is receiving financial support from the city of Antwerp.

author: CEP News
postText:

F√ºr die Zustellungen im Testgebiet wurde die¬†bpost¬†ausgew√§hlt; die Post wird nicht nur Pakete, sondern auch Paletten an Einzelhandelsgesch√§fte liefern.
Zustellungen werden emissionsfrei und zu festen Zeiten mit Lastenfahrr√§dern und elektrischen Lieferwagen durchgef√ºhrt. Zu den beteiligten Unternehmen geh√∂ren¬†Danone, die Supermarktkette¬†Ahold Delhaize, der Getr√§nkehersteller¬†Jacobs Douwe Egberts Professional Belgium, der Haar- und Kosmetikgro√üh√§ndler¬†Pro-Duo, der Mobilfunkbetreiber¬†Proximus, der Telefondienstleister¬†Telenet¬†und das Schuhgesch√§ft¬†Schoenen Torfs.¬†

We schreven zijn partij aan, net zoals de andere partijen: of ze inzicht verwerven is maar zeer de vraag, het is makkelijker de ogen te sluiten.
De minister is al vergeten dat er kinderen sterven onder zijn beleid en suste zichzelf met een bezoek aan een nieuwe kinderopvang.
De minister zijn Toekomstplan:
Duurzaam nadenken over de toekomst van de Kinderopvang .
Debatteren, ze debatteren reeds sinds 2020 en kinderen sterven of worden mishandeld, verwaarloosd enz.
van extra handen is absoluut geen sprake is gebleken uit ons doorgedreven onderzoek en net dat verdienen onze kinderen en het personeel dat met hart en ziel werkt . :(

Hij heeft de bevoegdheid als minister verantwoordelijkheid te nemen, we kunnen vaststellen dat de man in een ivoren toren leeft net zoals de gemandateerde voorzieningen die in zijn opdracht werken.

Het is vijf na twaalf

Dit kan echt niet langer, deel aub de petitie en onderteken ze zodat we de schrijnende en onveilige situaties voor minderjarigen eindelijk kunnen doorbreken.

postText:
üìñ This is my book suggestion for the weekend ‚ÄòAda Lovelace, Enchantress of Numbers‚Äô by Betty Alexandra Toole. A wonderful read!

Reading the letters addressed to various valuable people in her personal and scientific network (especially Charles Babbage), the hand-drawn diagrams, and the language used at the time, give a window to her scientific thinking and working process.

Her mother Lady Byron, a mathematician, her father Lord Byron, a poet - she united these two opposing personalities in herself.

The letters show that at times Ada Lovelace believed in the power that comes from the combination of mathematics and poetry. At other times, it was a struggle to unite her profession as a mathematician and to defend her every day of musical practice.

And what a gift she gave to us. Can you imagine that without ‚Äòpoetical science‚Äô, creating a meta-language for mathemathics and machines, most of our current technologies would not exist? For sure, you would not read this text right now.

‚ÄòImagination is the Discovering Faculty, pre-eminently. It is that which penetrates into the unseen worlds around us, the worlds of Science.‚Äô ‚Äî Ada Lovelace

Ada‚Äôs reputation has been used for several international celebrations of the achievements of women in science, technology, engineering, and maths (STEM).


üíé Some references for you üíé

Proximus Ada, founded in 2022: is the first Belgian center of excellence in AI and Cybersecurity.

Ada Lovelace Institute, founded in 2018 based in London, specialties: AI, Data, Research, Public Deliberation, Public Engagement, and Technology.

1984: ‚ÄòAda‚Äô is a trademark of the United States Department of Defense.

1980: Realisation of a programming language called ‚ÄúAda‚Äù. Ada is a structured, statically typed, imperative, and object-oriented high-level *programming language*, extended from Pascal and other languages.


Thank you Ada Lovelace and enjoy the #book!


#womenempowerment #adalovelace #stem #womeninscience

postText:
De namen van de laureaten worden pas na de veiling kenbaar gemaakt. Vermoedelijk gaat het over Telenet, Proximus, Orange, Citymesh en een nog onbekende vijfde speler. Na een gewonnen veiling krijgt de mobiele provider een vergunning om binnen de toegewezen radiofrequenties een nationaal netwerk aan te leggen of verder te exploiteren bij een bestaand netwerk.

Na die veiling wordt er met het BIPT - IBPT gekeken of er nog spectrum vrij is in de 3.400 MHz ‚Äì 3.800, MHz-band. Is dat het geval, dan komt er een Koninklijk Besluit voor private netwerken. Aanbieders zoals NTT, Amazon Web Services (AWS) en Cisco zien heel wat brood in private 5G-netwerken met kant-en-klare as-a-Service-diensten, maar kunnen vandaag nog niets betekenen in Belgi√´.

author: Lampugnale & Associati
postText:
L‚Äôho ripetuto tante volte: ma davvero si crede che ecologia ed ambientalismo siano le manifestazioni dietro l‚Äôeroina del caso o le facilonerie da salotto a COSTO ZERO? Non √® un giochino dove basta spingere un bottone e si diventa tutti verdi, ma un percorso culturale lungo e costoso, che richiede e richieder√† sacrifici soprattutto economici. Tanto pi√π onerosi quanto pi√π il processo sar√† gestito da ideologia senza tener conto di tutte le reali componenti. L‚Äôenergia elettrica √® legata alle fonti, ma se si punta subito sull‚Äôaumento ecologico del suo impiego senza curarsi della filiera beh, posso concepirlo come errore da fasce culturalmente superficiali. E quindi ora tutti a lamentarsi della bolletta: ma qualcuno ha calcolato quanto coster√† davvero alla tasca di Cittadini e Imprese la necessaria transizione ecologica? Forse si, ma comunicarlo fa perdere i consensi cos√¨ strumentalmente cavalcati. C'√® la copertura dalla vecchia economia per sostenere la nuova economia? No, perch√® i costi sociali del contraccolpo pandemico sono gi√† altissimi. Lo affermo da tempo e da tempo lancio l‚Äôallarme ma, spesso, vengo solo travolto dalle critiche di quelli che ora protestano per l'aumento bolletta. Passata la droga dei sostegni economici al settore, quali fasce di mercato potranno acquistare nei prossimi 10 anni auto elettriche coi loro soldi senza mandare a gambe all'aria l'economia? La produzione di tecnologia √® asiatica: ma acquistando da chi sta affrontando assai diversamente da noi l'impatto ambientale (cio√® senza rispettare l‚Äôecosistema), di fatto annulliamo i nostri sacrifici. Sono domande che, un inesperto come me - ma buon Imprenditore che si occupa di strategia - si pone da tempo e con sincerit√†, senza demagogia, cercando di capire se stiamo calcolando davvero la realt√†. Se allora siamo d'accordo per salvare davvero il clima come necessario imperativo, dobbiamo combattere subito l'ideologia che ignora, per esempio, cosa vorr√† dire smaltire i milioni di future batterie e, con coraggio, pianificarne la sostenibilit√† facendo i conti finali in tasca alla Famiglia media per i prossimi 10 anni minimo. Perch√© le sovvenzioni pubbliche - anche per mitigare il costo bolletta - non sono a impatto zero su economia e fiscalit√†, cos√¨ come non lo sono i digitoecologici un tanto al chilo. Io, da ambientalista indipendente dei tempi non sospetti, lo accetto concettualmente, sapendo che andr√† a sommarsi ad altri costi necessari da affrontare per ottimizzare il nostro futuro sociale.
--

author: Anouk Harmsen
postText:
Excited to see that 25 companies already signed the letter we sent to the #europeancommission, urging them to make one unified green product label mandatory.

A little over a week ago, we started the ùó¢ùóªùó≤ ùóöùóøùó≤ùó≤ùóª ùóüùóÆùóØùó≤ùóπ ùóñùóºùóÆùóπùó∂ùòÅùó∂ùóºùóª. This letter already gained over twenty signatories in its first week, and companies can still join the coalition here: https://lnkd.in/dRWmm5yp

A little background in case you missed our previous post: On the 30th of March, the European Commission will present a legislative proposal including rules on labelling the environmental impact of a product. The Commission is looking into using the Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) method, specifically the Product Environmental Footprint (PEF). The big question for this legislative proposal is whether the European Commission will make the labelling of the environmental impact of products mandatory or voluntary. The coalition is asking for it to be mandatory.

Some of the companies who have already joined the coalition:
Trust International B.V. Fairphone bol.com worldwatchers POGS B.V. Kids only headphones MediaMarktSaturn Fresh 'n Rebel Proximus Commown Remarketed Group Hedgehog Company

comments.commentAuthorDesignation: Deputy Director, Financial Services for the Poor at the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation. A digital economy that includes everyone benefits everyone. Author - The Castle and the Sandbox. Opinions mine.
comments.commentText:
I love your deep reflection on the need for innovation and impact, while keeping a firm eye on what drives people to adopt and change. I'm glad my advice had impact on you, however brutal it sounds in a way. After many years since we had this conversation, and many more endeavors in driving innovation in my efforts on financial inclusion, I passionately believe in it. I guess If I were to give the advice again, with more gray hair now and in a less brutal way, I would use this quote, attributed by conventional wisdom to Confucious - "I hear and I forget. I see and I remember. I do and I understand". You can tell and preach and teach and assist, but it's only when people act that true change happens - the secret sauce is understanding what makes them "do". But maybe this is way too polished now, you tell me.
So very happy to read you David!
